description: At least 400 people are arrested, as the latest of several weeks of mass rallies takes place.
title: Belarus protests: Opposition keeps up pressure on Lukashenko
title_page: Belarus protests: Opposition keeps up pressure on Lukashenko - BBC News
maintext: On at least two occasions in the past few weeks, he has been photographed near his residence in Minsk carrying a gun and being surrounded by his heavily armed security personnel.
